ygData.subject: Re: Request for advice
ygData.msgSnippet: That is good to know, but does killing the bandits in Greater and Lesser Faydark affect your faction standing with the Gypsies who sell magic weapons on
ygData.messageBody:
That is good to know, but does killing the bandits in Greater and Lesser
Faydark affect your faction standing with the Gypsies who sell magic weapons
on Antonica? I heard that killing the bandits on Antonica DOES lower your
faction with the Gypsies to the point that they don't sell to you and
eventually will KoS - anyone know the details here?


Faras of Qeynos
Half-Elf Bard
E'Ci server

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Abraham Hardjana [mailto:ahardjan@...]
> Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 10:40 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Request for advice
>
>
> From: Abraham Hardjana <ahardjan@...>
>
> It is true, the only faction loss that you receive from
> killing either the
> bandits or the sister in Lesser Fay is a faction loss with
> the Dervishes
> of Northern Ro. So kill away. Even the bandit camp in
> Greater Fay does
> not yield any faction loss. Though being a woodelf myself it is
> disconcerting to receive Wood Elf bits as loot from a bandit.
>
> Treilanin - Bard of the 16th Verse - Karana
